kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[@data-test='inventory-item-name' and text()='Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket']' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[@class='inventory_item_name' and text()='Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket']/ancestor::div[@class='cart_item']//div[@class='inventory_item_desc']' contains text 'It's not every day that you come across a midweight quarter-zip fleece jacket capable of handling everything from a relaxing day outdoors to a busy day at the office.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[@class='inventory_item_name' and text()='Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket']/ancestor::div[@class='cart_item']//div[@data-test='inventory-item-price']' contains text '49.99'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.arg: It's not every day that you come across a midweight quarter-zip fleece jacket capable of handling everything from a relaxing day outdoors to a busy day at the office.
